name: Skautfold: Into the Fray
description: Into the Fray is a fast action-shooter in the vein of Doom and Dark Messiah; using fast combat, reactive environments, and traps. Blast, kick, and dash your way through Rebels and Eldritch creatures to liberate the Isle of Portland; as it becomes consumed by Fog and the horrors therein.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service pack 3 Processor: 1.2 ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB RAM on Desktop, 1GB on certain Laptops. Integrated videocards not fully supported. DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: The game produces unreliable performance on Laptops due to integrated video chips, a home computer is recommended. Widescreen capable monitor (1080p) required.
